about_the_game:
Introducing " NATHUHARUCA Door Tilesets2" – the exciting sequel featuring a variety of captivating door designs!

Enhance your map with entrances to secret gardens, sealed dungeons, royal chambers, temple entrances, stained glass-style doors, and entrances to the hall where the boss enemy awaits!

A total of 120 pieces, including original designs and variations in darkness, lightness, and color, are included.
This set will further broaden the range of map designing possibilities!

Contents
Tilesets: 20 sheets (each sheet contains 6 door tiles)


・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
